title: Fabien Galthié
snippet: Fabien Galthié est né le 20 mars 1969 à Cahors. Ancien rugbymen international français de rugby à XV, il évoluait au poste de demi de mêlée. Il est actuellement le sélectionneur de l’Equipe de France depuis 2019 après avoir entraîné notamment le Stade français et Montpellier.

title: Fabien Galthié
snippet: Fabien Galthié was appointed head coach of the France national rugby union team in December 2019, immediately following the 2019 Rugby World Cup, where he had served as an assistant under Jacques Brunel.[37] His initial two-year contract was ...

title: French Coach Fabien Galthie Names 42-Man Rugby World Cup Training Squad - FloRugby
snippet: French Rugby coach Fabien Galthie has named a 42-man training squad for Rugby World Cup 2023 ahead of France's opening match with the New Zealand All Blacks
